title: Sir, I do most earnestly desire you to assist me in removing the neglect of wearing the university habits at solemn meetings according to the statutes: ...
author: University of Oxford. Vice-chancellor (1677-1679 : Nicholas)
notes: Title from first lines of text.
Signed at end: Joh. Nicholas Vice-Can.

The vice-chancellor's earnest appeal to Heads of Houses to co-operate with him in 'removing the neglect of wearing the university habits' at statutable times, especially at sermons and in the matter of wearing hoods by B.A.'s and M.A.'s at St. Mary's.
Reproduction of the original in the Bodleian Library.
